answers.answer: Go see your doctor. Itchy skin has several causes some being uncontrolled diabetes, an internal problem such as liver disease, or pruritis [dry skin], or..... Best starting point is controlling and managing your diabetes by eating a diabetic diet, maintaining normal body, and performing daily 30-60 minutes of exercise. Can't say much more as you didn't give us much information - 8 words -  to work with. Good luck -

question: I have diabets and my whole boby itches. What is wrong?
title: itchy body
